document.full_text: he may descend from sports royalty and the glamour of a famous father and a beauty queen mother, but chicago bulls center joakim noah is not shying away from the dirty work in pursuit of an nba title.
document.title: sporting royalty noah does the dirty work for bulls
lines_and_colors: he may descend from sports royalty and the glamour of a famous father and a beauty queen mother, but chicago bulls center joakim noah is not shying away from the dirty work in pursuit of an nba title.
